WorkItem.Description:
not the VP items.  (back in Wrath, it could be configured for either).
I tested this on various toons, of different classes/specs (each with the listing of "Cata Ready" or better)
I am attaching one such toon just for referance.
WorkItem.Summary: direct Upgrade - Gear/Cost shows only JP items

Comments.Message: for the attached file, Un-equip and remove the mark of available from some slot, (like Leggs, or Wrist) where VP items are possible.  When you then look at the Direct Upgrade-gear/cost you will only see JP items shown.
In the next version you'll be able to load different item costs from the menu.
